name: AvatarRoot
description: Displays a user's profile image or fallback text. Renders a `<span>` element.

props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: alt
props.description: Alternative text for the image, also used for generating fallback initials and background color

props.name: delay
props.description: Delay in milliseconds before showing the fallback after image load failure

props.name: src
props.description: The URL of the profile image to display

props.name: shape
props.description: Determines the shape of the Avatar.

props.name: size
props.description:
Determines the size of the Avatar.
Determines the typography size of the fallback text.
